query.statement: INSERT INTO HCSADM.UC_PTNR_ACTL_REG ( ACTL_DATE, ACTL_SEQ, CHK_PLAN_SEQ, PTNR_CD, USER_ID, PLAN_DATE, JOB_TC, ARRV_DATE, ARRV_TIME, FIN_DATE, FIN_TIME, ACTL_STAT_CD, ATST_STOP_DATE, ATST_STOP_TIME, ATST_STOP_RS_DATE, ATST_STOP_RS_TIME, RPT_PATH_TC, INTG_PRJ_NO, DEAL_LINE_DIV, PRJ_NO, HO_NO, CUST_TC, JBCL_CD, SPF_ITEM, GPS_X_CDT, GPS_Y_CDT, REG_DT, REG_USER_ID, CHG_DT, CHG_USER_ID) VALUES ( HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,NEXTVAL FOR HCSADM.SQ_UC_PTNR_ACTL_REG ,CAST(#ds_key.SUPP# AS INTEGER) ,CAST(#GV_LGORT# AS VARCHAR(10)) ,CAST(#GV_USER_ID# AS VARCHAR(15)) ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,CAST('04002' AS VARCHAR(10)) ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) ,CAST('21004' AS VARCHAR(10)) ,'' ,'' ,'' ,'' ,CAST('28001' AS VARCHAR(10)) ,CAST(#INTG_PRJ_NO# AS VARCHAR(6)) ,CAST(#DEAL_LINE_DIV# AS VARCHAR(3)) ,CAST(#PRJ_NO# AS VARCHAR(6)) ,CAST(#HO_NO# AS VARCHAR(3)) ,'' ,'' ,CAST(#SPF_ITEM# AS VARCHAR(100)) ,CAST(#GPS_X# AS INTEGER) ,CAST(#GPS_Y# AS INTEGER) ,(HEX(CURRENT DATE) || HEX(CURRENT TIME)) ,CAST(#GV_USER_ID# AS VARCHAR(15)) ,(HEX(CURRENT DATE) || HEX(CURRENT TIME)) ,CAST(#GV_USER_ID# AS VARCHAR(15)) )
